I found a list of personal titles of swordsmiths on this page.
http://www.sho-shin.com/ptitles.htm
I guess these are the titles Tom are thinking of. To bad i cant find
Sinsanshi among them. The closest i see is a Ryusenshi for a fellow with
the name Hirotaka, but i guess this list is probably far from complete.

Fredrik
